1.content:
Let's begin. The Final playoff game for the varsity soccer team of round rock high school. As the clock ticks by, the round rock team rejoices, as the clock nears zero, round rock is crowned state champs.

The crowd is going crazy. You see the team walking towards the crowd, ready to celebrate the title. You have plans to hangout with one of the girls after the game, who is that girl?
1.title: The title

choices: Shrink over her socks (brief unaware, then aware)
Shrink, as a friend  comes over (aware)
11.content:
Enyta. Oh enyta. She is one of the most beautiful girls at the school, in your opinion. You've known her since yall were 5. You guys had plans to go to her house, her parents trusted yall being alone.

The school is a block away from her house, as yall make your way to her house. She is in a good mood, and you take a chance. You see her free hanging hand, and you attempt to hold it.

She is suprised, but holds your hand, with a smile. Yall make it back to her house, and while she showers, you head up the stairs.

What happens next?
11.title: Enyta

choices: She let's Tyler pamper and worship her feet
She Let's Tyler choose his seat for a movie (between toes, cleavage, ass, ect)
112.content:
Tyler walks into enyta's room, turns the tv on, and walks towards the bed. He see's an unmarked soda can, and being a 14 year old boy, drinks it, leading to a blackout.

Tyler awakes in a white room, that is very soft and fuzzy.
Suddenly, the room is lifted into the are has light pours in. Tyler looks up as he see's 5 massive toes, painted a light pink color. Tyler knew that color. Light pink was the only shade enyta used for her nails.

Putting one and two together, tyler determined that the drink was the source that shrunk him, and he ended up over one of his bestfriends socks. Enyta always wears socks around the house.

Enyta felt a tiny object in her right sock, and decided to play with it. She felt the object slide between her toes, and playful squeezed it, while she waited for tyler.

Enyta looked down at her sock feet. She knows that tyler has a foot fetish, and knows he hates the fact she always wears socks. To reward him for being such a good friend, she decided to remove her socks, to let tyler get his glimpses at the pair of feet that belong to the girl he adores.

As she slides her socks off, she looks in between her big and second toes, and see's a small object, roughly one inch in size, that moves. Enyta moves her head closer to her foot and looks between her toes as the tiny creature raises it's head. Their eyes meet.

"Tyler?" Says enyta, with a smile spreading across her face, an idea coming to mind.
112.title: Is that a pebble?

choices: Bad job, time for the shoe!
1121.content:
"Well buddy, looks like you're gonna be in for a fun night. I assume you drank that can of soda I had on my desk" Said enyta, with a cute giggle.

"If you're wondering, yes I placed that can there. But that was meant for a prank for my brother. But, you'll do. I was going to make my brother my personal slave, so you can fill in his shoes for him. And speaking of shoes, you'll be spending alot of time with my shoes, and my feet! And yes, I know about your foot fetish, little one." she said smiling.

Tyler was in a pure wave of happiness. He gets to be a slave to the feet he has dreamed of being close to. He simply smiled and waited for the giant to give him his commands.

"Well, I just showered, so you're lucky. My feet reek. But you still have work. As your first task, clean between my toes. And If you do a good job, you may sleep between my toes! But, a bad job means you sleep in my shoes, and join me for my morning jog tomorrow.

Tyler couldn't help him self as he began licking between her toes, and removing her toe jam, with his hands and mouth. He loved his new job. He was so puny, and loved the fact her toes towered above him. He worked the best his little body could go.

Suddenly, he hears his giantess speak. What does she say?
1121.title: Personal Servant

12.content: Kathryn had been a crunch of yours since you were in the seventh grade and she was in eighth. You finally made your move and arranged a date of sorts with her after the game. You waited outside of the locker room then suddenly felt dizzy. Your world began to spin. Where did you wake up?
12.title: Kathryn

121.content:
You slowly come to in the locker room, and hear "well well well, you came!" It was Kathryn.

Was she alone?
121.title: Locker room (unaware)

1212.content:
"Awww he's so cute!" Sammi declared. You were both scared and excited for the situation.

"We may have some fun after the match we won." Kathryn unties her shoelaces. Sammi has already untied her laces, puts her feet off from the shoe, revealing her slender sweaty sock-clad feet. She first put her inshoe towards him. "Does tiny himself will smell worse smell than normal or just they smell the same thing hmm?" Girls giggled each other. "We shall see." Kathryn said and removed her sneakers, put the insole agains you just like Sammi did. While Sammis shoe was smelly, they were nothing compared to Kathryn. But that make you aroused still, have you an huge(or tiny lets say?) hard on.

"Does he enjoy it." Sammi laughs as they dazzle to you, trying to inspect you. "Then take this!" Sammi removes her socks, allow you to see a beautifull but briew view of her tired and sweaty soles. After a second, she drops her socks upon you, made you fall backwards with the weight of the fabric. You try to wiggle out of the sock upon you, but as you get closer with seeing a glimse of light, Kat drops her sock upon you too. You may be in heaven or hell, depending on your perspective.

"Should we call him sockant?" Sammi said. "Maybe footworm? Would he clean dirty feet?" Kat smirked. They kept humiliating you for a moment. While you never saw the feet of Kat, her foot sweat makes you to be slave to her.

"Can i take him under my sandals? That may be fun if i walk with him under my soles?"
1212.title: No, Sammi is also there.

14.content:
You have a plan with Erin. She has a kind of harsh personality and drinks alot; but you two are cool. You two take a walk to her home. She's still wearing her football outfit.

"Yea you've played so good, congratulations." Two of you arrived to her house. First thing she do is putting her shoes off; spreads a mix of sweaty and dirty musky smell. Both of you go to the her living room. After you sit one of the couches, she get to the other one; directly opposing side of you. "Gosh these socks gonna kill me. Mind if i?.." Without waiting an answer from you, she puts her socks off, revealing her size 9 tan latina feet. Normally, you would not look her like this; becuase she has a boyfriend. But you cant help you to notice her white toenail polish on her long toenails while she wiggles them in front of you. Scent of them even makes you more of them; but you still feel bad about the process.

"Whats up gringo? Something about my feet?" She breaks your immersion. "N... Just... You could still manage to have your toenails polished despite the football finals." She lifts her eyebrows. "Ohh yea i like to caress my feet. Just a minute." She jumps off of the couch, then brings you something to drink onto the table; then goes back to talk with her phone.

You try to drink and relax. But after a moment, you feel dizzy and feel like your surrounding is growing. Then you fell asleep.

When you woke up...
14.title: Erin

info.brief_description: Giant soccer players. What could go wrong?
info.description:
Rules: This story is mainly a foot fetish story. keep it foot related. Boobs and Butts are fine, and little to none death or gore scenes!

The girls:
Sammi: sophmore, 16. She's a blonde headed party girl, with a rump that makes seniors jealous. She almost always has sandals on, despite the weather. She loves showing off her feet, which are fairly attractive. Best buddies with kathryn And erin.

Kathryn: sophmore, 15 years of age. Sammi's best friend, and good friends with Erin. Kathryn is a shy girl, who has a crush on tyler (you) she's a Burnett who prefers sneakers over sandals, leading to bad smelling feet.

Erin: Jr,17. A Hispanic fellow, who is a ex druggie who drinks. Despite her illegal intersections, she is very pretty, with long flowing black hair. She has a boyfriend, so a tiny man would be a great pet.

Enyta: freshman, 15. Same grade as tyler. The two are amazing friends and Tyler likes her. Enyta is European decent, with tan skin and black her. She has a toned ass and a developing rack. She never wears sandals, being uncomfortable with her feet, believing they're unattractive, which is false.

Tyler: Fresham, 14. He's Hispanic, and knows all four of the girls. He is friends with all, and unaware of kathryns intrest in him. Tyler had a foot fetish, and Is in for a fun adventure.
